intro.title: Digital Menu, Simple and Smart
intro.text: MenuGardi helps food businesses provide their menus to customers digitally, quickly and always up-to-date without the need for paper menus.

card1.title: Suitable for restaurants
card1.text: Whether you are a cafe or a restaurant, MenuGardi makes managing items and prices simple and fast.

card2.title: Suitable for cafes and coffee shops
card2.text: Easily categorize and update your drinks and desserts menus with our simple panel.

card3.title: Suitable for fast food and chains
card3.text: Manage items and prices for multiple branches simultaneously, with a few simple clicks.

qrcode-usage.title: Unique barcode for each store and table
qrcode-usage.text: The 'Menu Navigation' system allows each store and each table to have a unique barcode. In this way, each store can manage its digital menu independently and customers directly access the menu of the same table and store.

dashboard-simple.title: Easy and fast management
dashboard-simple.text: The simple and smooth Menu Navigation management panel allows you to edit items, change prices and keep the menu up to date at any time.

migration-to-digital-menu.title: Cost Reduction
migration-to-digital-menu.text: By eliminating paper menus, you'll both save on printing costs and provide a more modern experience for your customers.
